verses.verse: Why do the nations<WH1471> rage,<WH7283> and the peoples<WH3816> plot<WH1897> a vain thing?<WH7385>
The kings<WH4428> of the earth<WH776> take a stand,<WH3320> and the rulers<WH7336> take counsel<WH3245> together,<WH3162> against Yahweh,<WH3068> and against his Anointed,<WH4899> saying,
"Let<WH5423>'s break their bonds<WH4147> apart,<WH5423> and cast<WH7993> their cords from us.<WH4147>"
He who sits<WH3427> in the heavens<WH8064> will laugh.<WH7832> The Lord<WH136> will have them in derision.<WH3932>
Then he will speak<WH1696> to them in his anger,<WH639> and terrify<WH926> them in his wrath:<WH2740>
"Yet I have set<WH5258> my King<WH4428> on my holy<WH6944> hill<WH2022> of Zion.<WH6726>"
I will tell<WH5608> of the decree.<WH2706> Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to me,<WH1121> "You are my son. Today<WH3117> I have become your father.<WH3205>
Ask<WH7592> of me,<WH5414> and I will give the nations<WH1471> for your inheritance,<WH5159> the uttermost parts<WH657> of the earth<WH776> for your possession.<WH272>
You shall break<WH7489> them with a rod<WH7626> of iron.<WH1270> You shall dash them in pieces<WH5310> like a potter<WH3335>'s vessel.<WH3627>"
Now therefore be wise,<WH7919> you kings.<WH4428> Be instructed,<WH3256> you judges<WH8199> of the earth.<WH776>
Serve<WH5647> Yahweh<WH3068> with fear,<WH3374> and rejoice<WH1523> with trembling.<WH7461>

Give sincere homage<WH5401> to the Son,<WH1248> lest he be angry,<WH599> and you perish<WH6> in the way,<WH1870> for his wrath<WH639> will soon be<WH4592> kindled.<WH1197> Blessed<WH835> are all those who take refuge in him.<WH2620>
